description: Main source file for a Flutter-based Notes app. It defines the main widget, theme, notes list UI, and the note editor page. The code includes classes for the app, notes list, and note editing functionality, managing a simple in-memory list of notes.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the theme and routing for the notes application.

classes.name: NotesListPage
classes.description: Displays the list of notes with ability to add and edit notes.

classes.name: NoteEditorPage
classes.description: Page for creating or editing a note, including input fields and save functionality.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: Data class representing a note with a title and body.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the NotesApp widget.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns the custom ThemeData following 'Ocean Professional' style.

methods.name: _openEditor
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor page and updates the list after editing or creating a note.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the note by popping the current route with note data if not empty.
